sen.j: 常盤井宮恒直親王（ときわいのみやつねなおしんのう、生年未詳 - 天文 (元号)21年（1552年）8月）は室町時代後期の皇族、常盤井宮家最後の当主。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Tokiwainomiya Tsunenao (date of birth unknown - August 1552) was a member of the Imperial family in the late Muromachi period, and was the last head of the Tokiwainomiya family.
Imperial Prince Tokiwainomiya Tsunenao (date of birth unknown - August, 1552) was a member of the Imperial family during the late Muromachi period, and was the last head of the Tokiwainomiya family.
Imperial Prince Tokiwainomiya Tsunenao (date of birth unknown - August, 1552) was a member of the Imperial family during the late Muromachi period, and was the last head of the Tokiwainomiya family.

sen.j: 5代当主・常盤井宮全明親王の子として生まれ、永正9年（1512年）11月に親王宣下される（『実隆公記』）。
sen.e: He was born as a son of Imperial Prince Tokiwanomiya Mataakira, who was the 5th head, and in November 1512, he was given the title of Imperial Prince ("Sanetaka ko ki" (the journal of Sanetaka SANJONISHI)).

He was born as the son of Imperial Prince Tokiwanomiya Mataakira, who was the 5th head, and in November 1512, he was given the title of Imperial Prince ("Sanetaka ko ki" - the journal of Sanetaka SANJONISHI)).

He was born as the son of Imperial Prince Tokiwainomiya Mataakira, who was the 5th head, and in December 1512, he was given the title of Imperial Prince ("Sanetaka ko ki" - the journal of Sanetaka SANJONISHI).
sen.cmt: Tokiwainomiyスペル訂正しました。)削除"November"→"December"に変更しました。

sen.j: その後大宰帥に任じられ、後柏原天皇の猶子となる。
sen.e: Afterwards, he was appointed as Dazai no sochi (Governor-General of the Dazai-fu offices), and adopted by Emperor Gokashiwabara.
Afterwards, he was appointed Dazai no sochi (Governor-General of the Dazai-fu offices), and adopted by Emperor Gokashiwabara.
Afterwards, he was appointed Dazai no sochi (Governor-General of the Dazai-fu offices), and adopted by Emperor Gokashiwabara.

The descendant after him was unknown. The family line of Daikakuji-to (imperial lineage starting with Emperor Kameyama), which started from Emperor Kameyama, ended at the time of Imperial Prince Tsunenao.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Descendants who came after him were unknown. The family line of Daikakuji-to (imperial lineage starting with Emperor Kameyama), which started from Emperor Kameyama, ended with Imperial Prince Tsunenao.
Descendants who came after him were unknown.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処

sen.j: 恒直親王を以って亀山天皇に始まる大覚寺統の正統は事実上断絶した。
sen.e: The family line of Daikakuji-to (imperial lineage starting with Emperor Kameyama), which started from Emperor Kameyama, ended with Imperial Prince Tsunenao.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
